jsfile.data: this.init = function () {textAlign(CENTER);Bullet.prototype.getSpeed = function () {return 10;};player.shootingDelay = 50;this.timer = 303;this.score = 0;engine.cameraPos = createVector(player.cameraPos.x, player.cameraPos.y);};this.overrideLateUpdate = function () {let managerObject = this;class OverriddenEnemy extends Enemy {earlyUpdate() {let playerPos = player.pos;if (this.collision(player)) {player.playerDeath();managerObject.score = 0;removeObject(this);} else if (this.collision(managerObject)) {this.moveTo = -random(3, 4.5);this.targetX = playerPos.x;}}display() {}lateUpdate() {let playerPos = player.pos;if (!this.moveTo) {this.dir = -500;this.moveTo = -random(3, 4.5);this.targetX = playerPos.x;}textSize(this.howBig / 2);let speed = 0.025;this.targetY = playerPos.y + this.dir;this.x = lerp(this.x, this.targetX, speed / 3);this.y = this.targetY;if (this.health <= 0) {removeObject(this);managerObject.timer -= 1;managerObject.score++;}fill(...this.color);circle(this.x + this.howBig / 2, this.y + this.howBig / 2, this.howBig);fill(125);text(this.health, this.x + this.howBig / 2, this.y + this.howBig / 2);this.dir += this.moveTo;if (this.targetY < -500) {this.moveTo = random(3, 4.5);this.targetX = playerPos.x;}super.lateUpdate();}}let howBig = round(random(40, 140));let enemy = new OverriddenEnemy(player.pos.x,2000 + howBig * 2,howBig,howBig);enemy.typeId = undefined;enemy.isShootable = true;enemy.health = round(random(10, 50) + howBig / 5);enemy.howBig = howBig;enemy.color = [random(0, 255), random(0, 255), random(0, 255)];engine.activeScene.addObj(enemy);};this.update = function () {player.shootTowards(width / 2, height / 2 - 50);player.pos.y = 50;player.pos.x = constrain(engine.mouseScreen().x, -825, 1208);mouseIsPressed = false;player.size.y = 50;engine.gui.textSize(30);engine.gui.text('score:' + this.score, windowWidth / 2, 50);if ((frameCount % this.timer !== 0 && player.pos) ||this.lastFrame === frameCount)return;this.lastFrame = frameCount;this.overrideLateUpdate();};
